name: NemesisDimensions
description:
You play as ZumbaLaCoipha, a teenager Nemesis who lost his clan againt Infinity World, who infected all of them. You'll need to make your way into insane levels while killing ennemies to collect xp in an insane 2D pixel RogueLike RPG.

Use your sword to kill multiple ennemies at a time, while trying to dodge their attacks. Jump from platforms to platforms to finish the levels, and sometimes phase into scary dark places.

Loot crates, finish levels to regain health !
